subject: code coverage
msgSnippet: Dear, I use a set of the tools referenced in the list : http://java-source.net/open-source/code-coverage to estimate the code covered of our projects... I
messageBody:
Dear,

I use a set of the tools referenced in the list : http://java-source.net/open-source/code-coverage

to estimate the code covered of our projects...
I however have various needs depending on the module.
I was wandering if there was a comparative analysis of the tools available somewhere ...

Specifically,
_ The "coarsness" / "fine grainedness" of the various tools
_ The easiness to deploy in various application servers ...
Typically results are usually flushed at VM exit time
_ Modularity of the code coverage reports

Tx for usefull pointers ! ! !

\T,










--
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand.
Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
Martin Fowler
